root.update_contents: <FlowDocument FontFamily="Microsoft YaHei UI" FontSize="14" LineHeight="14" PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="False" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph LineHeight="9.333333333333334"><Run FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="16" Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">【特点】</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">1. 隐私保护：完全本地部署，数据不经过第三方服务器。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">2. 简单易用：直观的用户界面，无需复杂配置。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">3. 跨设备支持：依托浏览器，实现PC、手机、平板等多种设备间的文件传输。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">4. 安全可靠：使用Https加密传输。</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>
